name: Taxi Parking Super Driver- Smashy Road Raceline of Sharp Driving Challenge
name_original: Taxi Parking Super Driver- Smashy Road Raceline of Sharp Driving Challenge
description:
Get ready for some Tire Burning Fun! Take Taxi Driving to New Extremes!

Let's be honest, taxi's are an important part of getting round in today's society. It can be a complicated task finding your way round a an urban city and finding the most cost effective route. Now with taxi parking you get to experience that same experience for yourself!

do you think you can be yourself the taxi driver that gets to the finish line in record time with no scratch at all?
do you think you can master handle the taxi parking ever and drive it to super-stardom?
prove your talents as a perfectionist taxi parking driver and pump the adrenaline through your veins
to win any taxi driving games and challenges
intact and safe,
so you can race again every day work like a professional taxi driver. good luck and remember to have fun!
